subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Chris Wood of England edged closer to a first European Tour win after a one-under-par 69 left him four shots clear in the Iberdrola Open in Mallorca, Spain, Saturday.
snippet: Chris Wood of England edged closer to a first European Tour win after a one-under-par 69 left him four shots clear in the Iberdrola Open in Mallorca, Spain, Saturday.
